projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title:Business Analytics Interns
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title:Business Analytics Interns


Description:

Students will be working with the Analytics team at Flipkart. Please refer to the

JD for more info

JD Link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PcyklYuLRAXE7zXixKdWfcGNi-Zhu7bl/view?

usp=sharing

Skill sets: Analytical knowledge (R/Python/SQL,etc)

Expected learning:

? Being part of the Central Analytics Organization at Flipkart, you get an

opportunity to work on a diverse set of problems that cut across

Marketing, Consumer as well as Seller Facing Products on Web &

Mobile, Pricing, Customer, various Business Categories, end-to-end

Supply Chain, Customer Support & so on.

? The ability to see what your contribution does to the business

Specific courses required for project execution: Single Degree or Dual degree

Any (most preferred option)
